name: Spirit Dance
description:
Spirit Dance is about Spirit and her (short) quest for the Treasure of the Spirits, which contains the Blessing of Spirits.

To acquire it, she will need to collect 3 Spirit Coins and enter the Blessed Land.

At her disposal is a simple set of moves, namely, walking, jumping, super jumping and spirit grasp.

Super Jumping allows for multiple jumps and higher jumps when against terrain of any kind

Spirit Grasp allows for grabbing of Pure Earth, freely moving it about to set up your own solutions.

There are no expectations for the game to be expanded upon as of now, and whether I will make more games only time will tell.

( I, as the creator, highly discourage donating despite the option being there, as the game is not worth it, and you can easily have it for free. Plus, the chances of more coming is low)
